script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.ACC.Task.Repairs
script.description: ACC - Task : Carrier Repair Bays and Barracks

line.comment: * Exit script, if carrier command software has been removed; not valid for stations
* When $timer.training is below zero, iniciate training for ADS crew
* Check, if the choosen current ship under repair is still docked at THIS
* First check for carrier damage, priorize carrier repairs if carrier is damaged
* If meeting all given criteria, repair choosen ship
* If repair ratio is above zero, and no ship was choosen for repair, search for some ship to repair

sval.val: ACC - Task : Carrier Repair Bays and Barracks
Exit script, if carrier command software has been removed; not valid for stations
When $timer.training is below zero, iniciate training for ADS crew
Check, if the choosen current ship under repair is still docked at THIS
First check for carrier damage, priorize carrier repairs if carrier is damaged
If meeting all given criteria, repair choosen ship
If repair ratio is above zero, and no ship was choosen for repair, search for some ship to repair
